name: Sent to Die
description:
Apparently, Matt Colville (whoever that person is) said something about soldiers being unable to handle a B/X style dungeon.

And then with some spitballing from @TrebuchetOps and @wereoctopus, I ended up with an idea for an OSR hack where you do, in fact, play soldiers sent into a dungeon with little preparation for what’s happening inside. 

Have fun with this! Let me know if this plugs-and-plays well. I honestly have no idea how OSR works lol
